nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument

Class DocResult

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.inl.blacklab.perdocument.DocResult

  • public class DocResult
extends java.lang.Object
    A document result, containing a Lucene document from the index and a collection of Hit objects.

        @Deprecated
public Hits getHits()
        Deprecated. inefficient when making concordances. Use getNumberOfHits() or getHits(int max) to retrieve some or all of the hits as needed
        Get all the hits in the document
        Returns:
        all hits in the document

      • getNumberOfHits

        public int getNumberOfHits()
        Get the number of hits in this document.
        Returns:
        the number of hits in the document

      • getHits

        public Hits getHits(int max)
        Get some or all hits in this document.
        Parameters:
        max - the maximum number of hits we want, or 0 if we want all hits. Only use 0 if you really want all the hits. For example, if making concordances, it is more efficient to retrieve only some of the hits, so BlackLab won't fetch context for all the hits, even the ones you don't want concordances for.
        Returns:
        the hits
